item.title: LatAm Prompt News Digest - August 13, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Migrants returning to Venezuela face debt and harsh living conditions — NBC

MARACAIBO, Venezuela — The hands of Yosbelin Pérez have made tens of thousands of the aluminum round gridles that Venezuelan families heat every day to cook arepas.
